name: Cross High
overview: Cross High is a motocross simulation in which the goal is to finish each circuit in a given time. There are 3 levels of difficulty with different requirements for the time needed to succeed. Each circuit is a set of obstacles (which include numerous ramps, slow pass areas, all kinds of hills, etc.). The high replayability of Cross High is due to the fact that the player constantly improves his driving skills, making more and more precise and "optimized" passages of the track.
